group.Description: experimental group the participant belonged to

Levels.human: participants who had interaction with a human
Levels.robot: participants who had interaction with a robot

sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

eng_level_run-1.Description: engagement level for the first conversation

Levels.high: high engagement (EC in the dataset paper)
Levels.low: low engagement (PL in the dataset paper)

eng_level_run-2.Description: engagement level for the second conversation

Levels.medium: medium engagement (AL in the dataset paper)

eng_level_run-3.Description: engagement level for the third conversation

Levels.high: high engagement (EC in the dataset paper)
Levels.low: low engagement (PL in the dataset paper)

missing_data.Description: data types missing for each participant
